a_1: Pomfy is a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI that enable two-way data synchronization between Photoshop and ComfyUI.
q_2: What is the purpose of Pomfy?
a_2: Pomfy allows for sending and receiving data between Photoshop and ComfyUI using custom nodes.
q_3: Is the Pomfy Photoshop Plugin required for using the custom Pomfy nodes?
a_3: Yes, the [Pomfy Photoshop Plugin](https://github.com/Millyarde/Pomfy-Plugin) is required to use Pomfy's custom nodes.
q_4: Is the Pomfy plugin currently functional?
a_4: No, the Pomfy plugin is still being developed and does not work yet.
